## 2. Team API Definitions

### {team_name}

```yaml
team:
  name: "{team_name}"
  type: "{stream-aligned|platform|enabling|complicated-subsystem}"
  owns:
    - "{domain_1}"
    - "{domain_2}"
  provides:
    - service: "{service_name}"
      interface: "{API|docs|self-service}"
      consumers: ["{team_1}", "{team_2}"]
  consumes:
    - service: "{service_name}"
      from: "{provider_team}"
  decisions_autonomous:
    - "{decision_1}"
    - "{decision_2}"
  decisions_escalate:
    - "{decision_1}"
```

_(Repeat for each team)_
